body: I'll hold off #17816 since the builds seems to be green again; probably a Kokoro regression. Will continue keep an eye on it though.

Last 5 runs on master have failed again:
https://source.cloud.google.com/results/invocations/1e891c3e-76be-476d-9e70-0f15670ea980/targets/github%2Fgrpc%2Fobjc_macos_dbg_native/tests
https://source.cloud.google.com/results/invocations/5ee2a127-f3cc-43fc-8316-3b7633d76c37/targets/github%2Fgrpc%2Fobjc_macos_dbg_native/tests
https://source.cloud.google.com/results/invocations/231b7225-f4d2-4bd9-9d80-5bac58b6c55e/targets/github%2Fgrpc%2Fobjc_macos_dbg_native/tests

There might be multiple problems:

- cfstream is failing with segfault
- seeing the "file not found" and "no such file or directory" problem again (and there has to be a logical explanation)
CFStream failure is identified and also fixed in #17816.
This has been failing consistently for the past 12 days.
Thanks for the notice. Making changes in process.

It seems that https://github.com/grpc/grpc/pull/17948 has improved the runtime of the suite,
but unfortunately the testsuite is still failing (possibly with a different error now):

https://source.cloud.google.com/results/invocations/6b32db56-a7da-4778-8726-4639e4b962e6/targets/github%2Fgrpc%2Fobjc_macos_dbg_native/tests
https://source.cloud.google.com/results/invocations/0b63de0b-0a87-4fad-a895-93c8e1f54667/targets/github%2Fgrpc%2Fobjc_macos_dbg_native/tests

e.g
```
2019-02-11 22:51:29.476800-0800 xctest[95446:157032] *** Terminating app due to uncaught exception 'NSInternalInconsistencyException', reason: 'Unable to report test assertion failure '((challengeHeader.length) greater than (0)) failed: throwing "Unable to report test assertion failure '((challengeHeader.length) greater than (0)) failed: ("0") is not greater than ("0") - No challenge in response headers {

This may happen when test cases are constructed and invoked independently of standard XCTest infrastructure, or when the test has already finished." - No challenge in response headers {

btw, please note that the interop test backends are currently down (not sure if ObjC tests depend on them).
I think that is exactly the reason. Local tests seem to be ok; interop tests with `grpc-test.sandbox.googleapis.com` are failing.
Oh and just checked the test status again. The most recent two master builds passed, probably because the interop test backends have been fixed.
